nw-1.name: Tulsi
nw-1.use: Immunity booster, respiratory relief, stress reduction
nw-1.preparation: Brew fresh leaves in hot water for 5 mins. Drink 2-3 cups daily.

nw-2.name: Coriander
nw-2.use: Stress relief, energy enhancement, digestive aid
nw-2.preparation: Use fresh leaves in cooking or as garnish.

ne-1.name: Curry Leaves
ne-1.use: Memory enhancement, focus improvement, anxiety relief
ne-1.preparation: Add to tempering for dishes or chew fresh leaves.

ne-2.name: Neem
ne-2.use: Blood purifier, skin healing, antibacterial, antifungal
ne-2.preparation: Boil leaves in water or chew fresh leaves on empty stomach.

sw-1.name: Amla
sw-1.use: Skin healing, immunity boost, vitamin C source
sw-1.preparation: Eat fresh fruit or take powder with water.

sw-2.name: Lemongrass
sw-2.preparation: Boil stalks in water for tea.

se-1.name: Mint
se-1.use: Digestive aid, headache relief, breath freshener
se-1.preparation: Steep 8-10 fresh leaves in hot water for 5 mins as tea.

se-2.name: Aloe Vera
se-2.use: Skin healing, burns relief, digestive health, immunity boost
se-2.preparation: Extract gel from leaves and apply topically or consume with water.
